label: water
caption: The sun beats down on the sandy beach as two energetic dogs playfully chase each other, one bounding effortlessly towards the calm blue waters of the ocean while its companion stands patiently at the shore, panting happily in the warm breeze. The sound of waves gently lapping against the sand provides a soothing background noise to the scene, punctuated by the occasional excited bark from the pair as they continue their joyful game. In the distance, a few seagulls soar overhead, their cries carried on the salty air as they scan for scraps and treasures washed up by the tide.
